# Matrix Inverter Project

This is a cross-platform Python GUI application for matrix inversion.

## Technologies
- Python 3.x
- tkinter for GUI (cross-platform)
- NumPy for matrix operations

## Code Style
- Follow PEP 8 guidelines
- Use type hints where appropriate
- Document functions with docstrings
- Keep the GUI responsive and user-friendly
